nodes.text: Star Wars 18 is the eighteenth issue of the Legends comic book series Star Wars. It was written by Brian Wood, illustrated by Stéphane Créty and Julien Hugonnard-Bert, and first published by Dark Horse Comics on June 11, 2014.
Princess Leia's wedding day has arrived—and so has the Empire! As Darth Vader's fleet bears down on the planet, the Rebels scramble to defend themselves—they have been double crossed!
